snippet.title: Lost Traces Unsolved Cases: False Awakening Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
The first trailer for the upcoming Demo of Lost Traces Unsolved Cases Prologue named False Awakening

"False Awakening" is a sneak peek into the chilling world of "Lost Traces." This bite-sized demo will immerse you in the early chapters of the main game, setting the stage for a mystery that will leave you questioning reality. Uncover hidden secrets, solve intriguing puzzles, and experience the atmospheric horror that defines "Lost Traces."

Wishlist the game on Steam now!

Steam Store Page: 
store.steampowered.com/app/2495090/Lost_Traces_Unsolved_Cases__Prologue/
